name: market for furnace, logs, average storage area, 6kW | furnace, logs, average storage area, 6kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7873/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'furnace, logs, average storage area, 6kW', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a log furnace that includes the storage area. It has a lifetime of 20 years for the furnace and 80 years for the chimney, while its operation time is 1,000 h/year and capacity of 6 kW. This category includes wood-fired cooking stoves, tiled and closed fireplaces and fireplace stoves of modern design, which serve as auxiliary heating or heating of a room. It is assumed that the furnace operates 1000 hours a year. The process includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of the furnace, the water storage and the chimney, their end-of-life, storage area and energy used for the construction.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'furnace, logs, average storage area, 6kW',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'furnace, logs, average storage area, 6kW',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
